attributes.action: stop lincolnshire council tax going up to fund the police.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Help stop lincolnshire council tax going up to fund the police. The goverment can stop our tax going up, so sign this and it may help to stop us having to pay more. We are saying no to paying more council tax in lincolnshire to fund lincolnshire police.

Council tax in Lincolnshire is set to rise after the police authority voted for a massive hike in its share of the county's bill in a bid to solve a funding crisis. 

At a meeting today, members voted to put the authority's share of the precept up by 78.9 per cent. 

This would mean around an extra £2 per week or around £104 per year for Band D householders. 

This is hardly fair in a low pay county like lincolnshire, when the average wage is the nmw. 

We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to stop lincolnshire county council putting the tax up to fund the police.
